ing: 4 large onions, cut in half and thinly sliced
1 (14.5 ounce) carton Campbell'sÂ® Sweet Onion Soup
1 (10.5 ounce) can  Campbell'sÂ® Condensed Beef Consomme or Campbell'sÂ® Condensed Beef Broth
4 slices Pepperidge FarmÂ® Garlic Texas Toast, prepared according to package directions
des: "Warm up with a bowl of this savory soup that's loaded with incredible flavor. Caramelized onions simmer with sweet onion soup and beef consommÃ©. It's topped with cheesy garlic Texas toast and is so good you may want to double the recipe because it will be gone in a flash!"
ins:
Heat the butter in a 4-quart saucepan over medium heat. Add the onions and cook for 15 minutes or until well browned and caramelized, stirring occasionally.
Stir the soup, consomme and 1 soup can water in the saucepan and heat to a boil. Reduce the heat to low. Cook for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Top each serving with 1 toast.
